snippet: Try your hand at making a recipe for fried chicken, then take part in this month’s Recipe Lab video chat with Norman King, a lifelong Southerner and a food editor at Southern Living.
abstract: Try your hand at making a recipe for fried chicken, then take part in this month’s Recipe Lab video chat with Norman King, a lifelong Southerner and a food editor at Southern Living.

headline.print_headline: Memo to Modern Cooks: Fear Not the Fryer
